reviewText: The Littlest angel is not much ... BUT the Little Boy Lost movie is a true and wonderful story of a brave 4 year old child, and the nation where so many turned out to search for him.  Although most of those were not bushmen and handled things wrong, the local officer of the law finally put the search into the hands of experienced bushmen.  Two of those men found him when one of the two saw a flickering of the boy in the bushes and the two men ran toward him, splitting into two sides and the quieter one finally was able to hold the boy, telling him they would take him to his daddy.
Quality of Littlest Angel is poor however this was not the fault of the supplier.
